roleset.name: act like a parent (rear a child), being a parent to; rearing

example.name: parent-v: both args, and GOL
example.text: Finally , it seems to me like an attempt by the government *PRO* to parent our children for us .

example.name: parenting-n: both args
example.text: A second goal of the study was to explore possible differences between mothers and fathers in their parenting of the child at ages 2 and 4 years.
example.arg: of the child at ages 2 and 4 years.

roleset.note: PARENT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from parent.01-v)
PARENTING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No corresponding VNcls or verb frame. (from parenting.01-n)
